author: kwright
msg: Fix for CONNECTORS-333.  Use the CloseHook API to free connections.  We still get a warning message, but that's going to happen since the connection manager creates a static thread.

author: tedyu
msg: HBASE-5163 TestLogRolling#testLogRollOnDatanodeDeath fails sometimes on Jenkins or hadoop QA ("The directory is already locked.") (N Keywal)
